projects.title: Contact Management App
projects.description: A Laravel-based contact manager with CRUD operations, advanced filtering (age, city, gender, activity), CSV import/export, and PDF generation. Designed with a modern landing page and secure authentication system.

projects.title: My Portfolio Website
projects.description: A modern, animated portfolio built with Next.js, featuring dynamic sections, smooth page transitions, and a dark theme toggle to showcase projects and skills.

projects.title: Perfekt Deutsch Akademie
projects.description: A professional, animated website for a German language academy built with Next.js, Tailwind, Framer Motion, and CMS integration. Fully responsive with clean UI, footer navigation, and custom domain setup.
